title: Kled's Courage bar displays "Rage" in chat when pinged (text, no affect on gameplay)
body:
When pinging Kled's courage bar, it posts "[timestamp] <Summoner Name> (Kled): **Rage** X%" in chat, instead of of "[timestamp] <Summoner Name> (Kled): **Courage** X%"

Very minor bug, can be recreated 100% of the time. Displays it in both mounted and unmounted form.

replies.body: Should be fixed in the next patch. It works internally the last time I checked.
Still can't pin support items ie targons and spooky ghosts. Can you ensure every item that can be activated , can also be pinged ? Thanks

Still can't ping ult cooldown while dead, unless you died OOM, in which case it says "out of mana".
Oh also, if you try and ping the cooldown while you're dead it still consumes your pings, despite not showing anything.
